Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. After careful consideration and evaluation of its value, we propose a purchase price of $950,000 for this exceptional item. This offer reflects not only the product's quality but also our commitment to finding the right buyer who appreciates its true worth. We believe this price presents an excellent opportunity for both parties and hope it aligns with your expectations. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any other information you require to make an informed decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
